about_the_game:
[The demo is available in english]

Jerico Proxyma - Rogue Galaxy is a retro turn-based team RPG complemented by a starship management simulator that places a strong emphasis on environmental interactions. The graphics are inspired by the comics of the 70s and 80s, such as István Nemere's "The Secret of the Dome City" and Pierre Christin's "Valérian and Laureline," while also paying homage to the greats of Hungarian science fiction, such as Imperium Galactica

  • A vast, explorable galaxy where you can trade, smuggle, pirate, be a scavenger, be a warlord, or a justicar

  • During the game, you can assemble the optimal team from 9 character classes, each excelling in combat, incapacitating enemies, or sustaining the team. Additionally, there are 6 bonus characters who temporarily join the team.

  • Complex space battles allow you to attack enemies with cannons, turrets, torpedoes, interceptors, or through hacking. Your ship, the [The Outlaw - Torpedo Frigate], is a key player in the game, and it can be modded with nearly endless combinations thanks to the upgrades.

  • 5 factions control the world, and you can ally with any of them.

  • The game heavily relies on a random number generator that shapes the galaxy, ensuring that no two playthroughs are ever the same.

  • Interaction with the environment is just as important as battle; enemies can be avoided, sabotaged, or even defeated without combat if you assemble the right team, use their own turrets against them, ambush them, or force them into unfavorable positions. Save ammo, as it's expensive, and the enemies show no mercy; this game is not for beginners.

  • Some weapons can be modded, you can wield two of certain weapons at once, and there are legendary alternatives to some.

  • Two endings.

  • A close relative to "Fear and Hunger," except that the injuries we incur are not permanent, but still, it is not an easy game.

  • There are multiple solutions to every problem.

  • Featuring works by Hungarian musicians such as Retrööx, Girl in the Mirror, StellarDrone, and others.

content_descriptors.notes: The show a solar system in its dying days, where the crime is rampant in human life and empathy is basically worthless, you often get into conflict with local pirate gangs, you can also sell drugs, and visit a red light district in the game.

short_description: At the end of human civilization, the world's most unfortunate mercenary squad accidentally sets off a chain reaction that completely transforms Jerico Proxyma's solar system and sheds light on the history of dark creation in this corner of the galaxy. Outlawman!
